article_title: 'Important step' as Ireland recognises Palestinian state
sentence: About  1,200  people  were  killed,  and  more  than  250  were  taken  to  Gaza  as  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  tallies.

article_title: 'Important step' as Ireland recognises Palestinian state
sentence: More  than  35,000  Palestinians  in  Gaza  have  so  far  been  killed  by  the  Israeli  military  in  response,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
